seg-source.mrk: Slow-Moving Indicator by Plants

target.mrk: 按工廠的呆滯物料指示碼

trans-unit.source: Displays two key figures for one material in all available plants.

seg-source.mrk: Displays two key figures for one material in all available plants.

target.mrk: 顯示單一物料在所有可用工廠中的兩個關鍵數值。

source.mrk:
General Remarks

  1. This template is based on the DITA information type concept and is for the target group of end users.

  2. Delete the internal comments from your info object when you have filled in the required information (at the latest, before you release your object for translation or publication). The content of the draft-comment tag will not be included in the production export, but it will be transported to the translation system, where it may be a distraction for the translators. You can always look at the original template if you need the instructions again at a later date.

  3. For technical reasons to do with the way that content is displayed in WebAssistant, you may not leave the tag conbody empty. If the short description is sufficient as primary help, you have to copy the text of the short description into a paragraph in the conbody (for example, in the Definition keyblock).

  4. Links within primary help are currently not supported by WebAssistant – do not set any links from one WebAssistant content document to another!

  5. Use user-centric language in the primary help where appropriate. Address the user directly with "you".

  • This template is based on the DITA information type concept and is for the target group of end users.

    • This template is based on the DITA information type concept and is for the target group of end users.

  • Delete the internal comments from your info object when you have filled in the required information (at the latest, before you release your object for translation or publication). The content of the draft-comment tag will not be included in the production export, but it will be transported to the translation system, where it may be a distraction for the translators. You can always look at the original template if you need the instructions again at a later date.

  • For technical reasons to do with the way that content is displayed in WebAssistant, you may not leave the tag conbody empty. If the short description is sufficient as primary help, you have to copy the text of the short description into a paragraph in the conbody (for example, in the Definition keyblock).

source.mrk:
Title

  1. The title is mandatory.

  2. The title of the primary help topic is equivalent to the short text of the data element or label used on the app user interface. Make sure that the user interface texts are precise and easy to understand. Work with your developers to try to make the UI texts self-explanatory. When the user interface texts are self-explanatory, you do not need create primary help topics for the UI elements.

  3. The maximum length of the title should be 20 characters. This leaves some extra characters for translation while still ensuring that the title is correctly displayed by WebAssistant. WebAssistant cannot deal with longer titles.

  4. If possible, avoid abbreviations.

  • The title is mandatory.

    • The title is mandatory.

  • The title of the primary help topic is equivalent to the short text of the data element or label used on the app user interface. Make sure that the user interface texts are precise and easy to understand. Work with your developers to try to make the UI texts self-explanatory. When the user interface texts are self-explanatory, you do not need create primary help topics for the UI elements.

    • The title of the primary help topic is equivalent to the short text of the data element or label used on the app user interface. Make sure that the user interface texts are precise and easy to understand. Work with your developers to try to make the UI texts self-explanatory. When the user interface texts are self-explanatory, you do not need create primary help topics for the UI elements.

  • The maximum length of the title should be 20 characters. This leaves some extra characters for translation while still ensuring that the title is correctly displayed by WebAssistant. WebAssistant cannot deal with longer titles.

    • The maximum length of the title should be 20 characters. This leaves some extra characters for translation while still ensuring that the title is correctly displayed by WebAssistant. WebAssistant cannot deal with longer titles.

  • If possible, avoid abbreviations.

    • If possible, avoid abbreviations.

    Minimum Queue Time

source.mrk:
Shortdesc

  1. The short description is mandatory.

  2. Enter the short description in the shortdesc tag, directly below the title at the top of the info object.

  3. Give a short description of the purpose of the user interface element.

    The short description only appears in the carousel, it will not be displayed in the entire topic that appears next to the hotspot when users click on it on the UI. Often, the information in the short description is key information that should be read by the user first. Therefore, it might make sense to use this information again in the ConBody, since this text appears directly next to the hotspot – where a user presumably starts reading.

  4. Write one sentence with up to 70 characters. WebAssistant only displays 3 rows in the carousel and translation may need some extra characters. As WebAssistant uses a variable-width font, where the characters differ in size from one another, we cannot tell exactly how many characters are shown. Always check in WebAssistant, if your short descriptions gets cut off.

  5. For technical reasons to do with the way that content is displayed in WebAssistant, you may not leave the tag conbody empty. If the short description is sufficient as primary help, you have to copy the text of the short description into a paragraph in the conbody.

  • The short description is mandatory.

    • The short description is mandatory.

  • Enter the short description in the shortdesc tag, directly below the title at the top of the info object.

seg-source.mrk: <source>In-App Help</source>

target.mrk: <source>In-App Help</source>

seg-source.mrk: Definition

target.mrk: 定義

source.mrk:
1. This section is optional.

  2. Explain the meaning of the user interface term.

  3. Start with a verb and use an initial capital letter, for example, “Specifies”, "Indicates”, or “Determines”. Do not use phrases such as “This field” or “This indicator”. End the phrase with a period.

  • This section is optional.

    • This section is optional.

  • Explain the meaning of the user interface term.

    • Explain the meaning of the user interface term.

  • Start with a verb and use an initial capital letter, for example, “Specifies”, "Indicates”, or “Determines”. Do not use phrases such as “This field” or “This indicator”. End the phrase with a period.

    • Start with a verb and use an initial capital letter, for example, “Specifies”, "Indicates”, or “Determines”. Do not use phrases such as “This field” or “This indicator”. End the phrase with a period.

    Specifies the shortest queue time an order waits at the work center before it is processed.

trans-unit.source: Displays the key figures <uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol> for one material in all available plants - except the selected plant - based on the parameters <emphasis>key date</emphasis> and <emphasis>days with low consumption</emphasis>.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the key figures <uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol> for one material in all available plants - except the selected plant - based on the parameters <emphasis>key date</emphasis> and <emphasis>days with low consumption</emphasis>.

target.mrk: 根據<emphasis>關鍵日期</emphasis>和<emphasis>低耗用天數</emphasis>參數，顯示單一物料在所有可用工廠 (所選工廠除外) 的 <uicontrol>[呆滯物料指示碼]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[庫存數量]</uicontrol> 關鍵數值。

trans-unit.source: The chart has been enhanced with two further key figures used for orientation: <uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol>. Both are based on the filter criteria you have set in the header.

seg-source.mrk: The chart has been enhanced with two further key figures used for orientation:
<uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol>.
Both are based on the filter criteria you have set in the header.

target.mrk: 圖表已透過用於定位的兩個進階關鍵數值進行增強：
<uicontrol>[呆滯物料指示碼]</uicontrol> 和 <uicontrol>[庫存數量]</uicontrol>。
兩個數值皆會以您在表頭中設定的篩選準則為基礎。

seg-source.mrk: Use

target.mrk: 使用

source.mrk:
1. This section is optional.

  2. Answer the questions: Under what circumstances does the user use the UI element? What should the user enter in this field and why? What happens when the user enters a specific value or selects a checkbox?

  3. Only mention and explain input values or fixed values when the user needs this information to decide which value to select. If there are predefined values, the user can access them via the value help. If necessary, explain to the user what a value in a read-only field signifies.

  4. Only explain what happens when a checkbox or radio button is not selected when this has unexpected results for the user or when the result is not the opposite of a selected checkbox.

  • This section is optional.

    • This section is optional.

  • Answer the questions: Under what circumstances does the user use the UI element? What should the user enter in this field and why? What happens when the user enters a specific value or selects a checkbox?

    • Answer the questions: Under what circumstances does the user use the UI element? What should the user enter in this field and why? What happens when the user enters a specific value or selects a checkbox?

  • Only mention and explain input values or fixed values when the user needs this information to decide which value to select. If there are predefined values, the user can access them via the value help. If necessary, explain to the user what a value in a read-only field signifies.

    • Only mention and explain input values or fixed values when the user needs this information to decide which value to select. If there are predefined values, the user can access them via the value help. If necessary, explain to the user what a value in a read-only field signifies.

  • Only explain what happens when a checkbox or radio button is not selected when this has unexpected results for the user or when the result is not the opposite of a selected checkbox.

    • Only explain what happens when a checkbox or radio button is not selected when this has unexpected results for the user or when the result is not the opposite of a selected checkbox.

    For a goods receipt with reference to a purchase order or to a production order, the system automatically calculates the number of goods receipt slips to be printed for material document items. The number is a quotient of the quantity of goods received and the number specified here. The calculated value is rounded up to the next whole number. If you do not enter a value, the material document is printed on only one goods receipt slip.

trans-unit.source: The chart supports you to find plants that have a low <uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and a high <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol> at the same time. In this case, surplus stock could be transferred to a plant with a high Slow-Moving Indicator but a lower level of stock quantity. You can directly navigate from a selected plant to the <uicontrol>Transfer Stock - Cross Plant</uicontrol> app to initiate such a stock transfer.

seg-source.mrk: The chart supports you to find plants that have a low <uicontrol>Slow-Moving Indicator</uicontrol> and a high <uicontrol>Stock Quantity</uicontrol> at the same time.
In this case, surplus stock could be transferred to a plant with a high Slow-Moving Indicator but a lower level of stock quantity.
You can directly navigate from a selected plant to the <uicontrol>Transfer Stock - Cross Plant</uicontrol> app to initiate such a stock transfer.

target.mrk: 此圖表可協助尋找同時具有低 <uicontrol>[呆滯物料指示碼]</uicontrol> 和高 <uicontrol>[庫存數量]</uicontrol> 的工廠。
在此情況下，剩餘庫存會調撥至具有高呆滯物料指示碼但庫存數量層級較低的工廠。
您可直接自所選工廠瀏覽至 <uicontrol>[調撥庫存 - 跨工廠]</uicontrol> 應用程式來開始這類庫存調撥。

trans-unit.source: Note that such a stock transfer has two opposite effects:

seg-source.mrk: Note that such a stock transfer has two opposite effects:

target.mrk: 請注意，這類庫存調撥會產生兩個相反的結果：

trans-unit.source: For the issuing plant the Slow-Moving Indicator will increase due to the fact that the stock quantity decreases.

seg-source.mrk: For the issuing plant the Slow-Moving Indicator will increase due to the fact that the stock quantity decreases.

target.mrk: 針對發貨工廠，呆滯物料指示碼將會因庫存數量減少而增加。

trans-unit.source: For the receiving plant the Slow-Moving Indicator will decrease due to the fact that the stock quantity increases.

seg-source.mrk: For the receiving plant the Slow-Moving Indicator will decrease due to the fact that the stock quantity increases.

target.mrk: 針對收貨工廠，呆滯物料指示碼將會因庫存數量增加而減少。
